page.title: 09ROAD TRANSPORT
page.content: Although we live in the country there is quite a lot of traffic on these little country roads.There are wheeled bikes and big buses which would hold 52 people.The commonest vehicle on these roads is a car which can hold up to 5 people but is best just with 4 in a car:2 in the front 2 in the back.You can get some 4 wheeled drive vehicles such as Landrover but you usually have it in 2 wheeled drive when you are on the road .There is quite alot of wagons on these roads as farmers need to use or hire them when buying or selling such things as straw,hay,animals and implements.One of'our maths books asks us to do traffic counts but our teacher said it would be a waste of time because only 10_15 vehicles would pass here between 9am and 3.30pm.
